name: The walk (a pearlmethyst game)
description:
It's a lovely day on Beach city and Pearl and Amethyst go for a walk.

---

A short test game I made in a week to practice using Renpy!

All the character drawings are mine, except the backgrounds that are traced from official backgrounds from the show to give them an sketchier look. Enjoy!

Version 1.1 for typos!
